# Question 1
```{r}
betaPDFs <- c()

alphas <- c(0.5, 5, 1, 2, 2)
betas <- c(0.5, 1, 3, 2, 5)

generateBetaPDFs <- function(alphaArray, betaArray){
  betaDistributions <- c()
  for(i in 1:5){
    a <- alphaArray[i]
    b <- betaArray[i]
    betaDistributions[[i]] <- rbeta(1000, a, b)
  }
  return(betaDistributions)
}

betaPDFs <- as.data.frame(generateBetaPDFs(alphas, betas))

# ! come back to refactor, so that the colors are distributed by palette # betaPDFs <- as.data.frame(t(betaPDFs))
ggplot() + geom_freqpoly(aes(betaPDFs[[1]])) +
  geom_freqpoly(aes(betaPDFs[[2]], color="red")) +
  geom_freqpoly(aes(betaPDFs[[3]], color="orange")) +
  geom_freqpoly(aes(betaPDFs[[4]], color="yellow")) +
  geom_freqpoly(aes(betaPDFs[[5]], color="blue")) +
  theme(text=element_text(family="Comic Sans MS"))
```
